slider.text2:
Continuous Core Geological Drilling provides accurate and representative samples of geological layers. Key advantages of our services include:

* Surface drilling: Performed with specialized equipment ensuring quality and efficiency.

* Rigorous monitoring: Adhering to the highest safety and precision standards at every stage.

* Drilling log: An essential document that, through mapping, offers details on:

The composition and texture of the layers.
Mechanical properties of soil and rocks, depending on depth.
Detailed geological interpretation of the data.
This drilling method is crucial for in-depth subsurface analysis and is used in geological, mining, and infrastructure projects. The drilling log ensures clear and complete documentation throughout the process.

*Our team has extensive experience in deep well drilling, offering complete solutions for access to potable and industrial water. Our services support industrial, agricultural, and residential projects by ensuring sustainable access to water sources.
* Pumping Tests and Monitoring
Pumping tests are essential for evaluating the performance of a well and groundwater supply systems. They provide information about
sustainable flow rate, hydraulic conductivity, and groundwater behavior.
